member.name: T:ZeroDep.Json
member.summary: A utility class to serialize and deserialize JSON.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Serialize(System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object. Supports anonymous and dynamic types.
member.returns: A JSON representation of the serialized object.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Serialize(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to the specified TextWriter. Supports anonymous and dynamic types.
member.param: The output writer. May not be null.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Deserialize(System.String,System.Type,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Deserializes an object from the specified text.
member.returns: An instance of an object representing the input data.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Deserialize``1(System.IO.TextReader,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Deserializes an object from the specified TextReader.
member.param: The input reader. May not be null.
member.returns: An instance of an object representing the input data.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Deserialize``1(System.String,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Deserializes an object from the specified TextReader.
member.returns: An instance of an object representing the input data.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Deserialize(System.IO.TextReader,System.Type,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Deserializes an object from the specified TextReader.
member.param: The input reader. May not be null.
member.returns: An instance of an object representing the input data.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.DeserializeToTarget(System.String,System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Deserializes data from the specified text and populates a specified object instance.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.DeserializeToTarget(System.IO.TextReader,System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Deserializes data from the specified TextReader and populates a specified object instance.
member.param: The input reader. May not be null.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.Apply(System.Object,System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Applies the content of an array or dictionary to a target object.

member.name: T:ZeroDep.Json.ListObject
member.summary: Defines an object that handles list deserialization.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.Json.ListObject.List
member.summary: Gets or sets the list object.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.ListObject.Clear
member.summary: Clears the list object.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.ListObject.Add(System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Adds a value to the list object.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.Json.ListObject.Context
member.summary: Gets the current context.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.GetItemType(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the type of elements in a collection type.
member.returns: The element type or typeof(object) if it was not determined.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Returns a System.Object with a specified type and whose value is equivalent to a specified input object. If an error occurs, a computed default value of the target type will be returned.
member.param: The input object. May be null.
The target type. May not be null.
member.returns: An object of the target type whose value is equivalent to input value.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Object,System.Type,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Returns a System.Object with a specified type and whose value is equivalent to a specified input object. If an error occurs, a computed default value of the target type will be returned.
member.param: The input object. May be null.
The target type. May not be null.
member.returns: An object of the target type whose value is equivalent to input value.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.TryParseDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the JSON string representation of a date time to its DateTime equivalent.
member.returns: A DateTime value if the text was converted successfully; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.TryParseDateTime(System.String,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)
member.summary: Converts the JSON string representation of a date time to its DateTime equivalent.
member.returns: A DateTime value if the text was converted successfully; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.TryParseDateTime(System.String,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Converts the JSON string representation of a date time to its DateTime equivalent.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the DateTime equivalent.
member.returns: true if the text was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.TryParseDateTime(System.String,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Converts the JSON string representation of a date time to its DateTime equivalent.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the DateTime equivalent.
member.returns: true if the text was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Defines an interface for quick access to a type member.

member.summary: Gets a component value.
member.returns: The value.

member.summary: Sets a component's value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the member name.

member.value: The name used during serialization and deserialization.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.EscapedWireName
member.summary: Gets or sets the escaped name used during serialization and deserialiation.
member.value: The escaped name used during serialization and deserialiation.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance has default value.
member.value: true if this instance has default value; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the accessor.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the member type.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.
member.returns: A that represents this instance.

member.summary: Gets or creates a member instance.
member.returns: A new or existing instance.

member.summary: Applies the dictionary entry to this member.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.IsNullDateTimeValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is equal to the zero value for its type.
member.returns: true if the specified value is equal to the zero value.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.IsZeroValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is equal to the zero value for its type.
member.returns: true if the specified value is equal to the zero value.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.EqualsDefaultValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if a value equals the default value.
member.returns: true if both values are equal; false otherwise.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.RemoveDeserializationMember(System.Type,ZeroDep.JsonOptions,ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition)
member.summary: Removes a deserialization member.
member.param: The type. May not be null.
The member. May not be null.
member.returns: true if item is successfully removed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Removes a serialization member.

The member. May not be null.
member.returns: true if item is successfully removed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Adds a serialization member.
member.param: The type. May not be null.
The member. May not be null.
member.returns: true if item is successfully added; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets the serialization members for a given type.
member.param: The type. May not be null.
member.returns: A list of serialization members.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.GetDeserializationMembers(System.Type,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Gets the deserialization members for a given type.
member.param: The type. May not be null.
member.returns: A list of deserialization members.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition.UsingLock``1(System.Action{``0},``0)
member.summary: Run a specified action, using the member definition lock.
member.param: The action. May not be null.

member.summary: Writes a value to a JSON writer.
member.param: The writer. May not be null.
A graph of objects to track cyclic serialization.

member.summary: Writes a stream to a JSON writer.
member.param: The writer. May not be null.
The stream. May not be null.
member.returns: The number of written bytes.

member.summary: Writes an enumerable to a JSON writer.

member.summary: Writes a name/value pair to a JSON writer.

The name. null values will be converted to empty values.

member.summary: Writes a string to a JSON writer.
member.param: The input writer. May not be null.

member.summary: Serializes an object with format. Note this is more for debugging purposes as it's not designed to be fast.
member.param: The JSON object. May be null.
The options to use. May be null.
member.returns: A string containing the formatted object.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.Json.SerializeFormatted(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Object,ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Serializes an object with format. Note this is more for debugging purposes as it's not designed to be fast.
member.param: The output writer. May not be null.
The JSON object. May be null.
The options to use. May be null.

member.summary: Writes a JSON deserialized object formatted.
member.param: The JSON object. May be null.
The options to use. May be null.
member.returns: A string containing the formatted object.

member.summary: Writes a JSON deserialized object formatted.
member.param: The output writer. May not be null.
The JSON object. May be null.
The options to use. May be null.

member.summary: Escapes a string using JSON representation.

member.name: T:ZeroDep.JsonOptions
member.summary: Define options for JSON.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.ThrowExceptions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether exceptions can be thrown during serialization or deserialization. If this is set to false, exceptions will be stored in the Exceptions collection. However, if the number of exceptions is equal to or higher than MaximumExceptionsCount, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: true if exceptions can be thrown on serialization or deserialization; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.MaximumExceptionsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum exceptions count.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.JsonPCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSONP callback. It will be added as wrapper around the result. Check this article for more: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSONP

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.GuidFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the guid format.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the date time format.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.DateTimeOffsetFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the date time offset format.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.DateTimeStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets the date time styles.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.StreamingBufferChunkSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the streaming buffer chunk. Minimum value is 512.
member.value: The size of the streaming buffer chunk.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.FormattingTab
member.summary: Gets or sets the formatting tab string.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.Exceptions
member.summary: Gets the deseralization exceptions. Will be empty if ThrowExceptions is set to false.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.FinalizeSerializationMembers(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition})
member.summary: Finalizes the serialization members from an initial setup of members.
member.param: The input type. May not be null.
The members. May not be null.
member.returns: A non-null list of members.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.FinalizeDeserializationMembers(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ZeroDep.Json.MemberDefinition})
member.summary: Finalizes the deserialization members from an initial setup of members.
member.param: The input type. May not be null.
The members. May not be null.
member.returns: A non-null list of members.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.SerializationOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the serialization options.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.WriteValueCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a write value callback.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.BeforeWriteObjectCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called before an object (not a value) is serialized.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.AfterWriteObjectCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called before an object (not a value) is serialized.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.WriteNamedValueObjectCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called before an object field or property is serialized.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.CreateInstanceCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called before an instance of an object is created.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.MapEntryCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called during deserialization, before a dictionary entry is mapped to a target object.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.ApplyEntryCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called during deserialization, before a dictionary entry is applied to a target object.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.GetListObjectCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is called during deserialization, to deserialize a list object.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.AddException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Adds an exception to the list of exceptions.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.Clone
member.summary: Clones this instance.
member.returns: A newly created insance of this class with all values copied.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonOptions.GetCacheKey
member.summary: Gets a key that can be used for type cache.
member.returns: A cache key.

member.summary: Defines a callback delegate to customize JSON serialization and deserialization.

member.summary: The write value event type.

member.summary: The before write object event type.

member.summary: The write named value object event type.

member.summary: The create instance event type.

member.summary: The map entry event type.

member.summary: The apply entry event type.

member.name: T:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for a JSON event.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Object,System.Object},ZeroDep.JsonOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Object,System.Object},ZeroDep.JsonOptions,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.Options
member.summary: Gets the options currently in use.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.Writer
member.summary: Gets the writer currently in use.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.ObjectGraph
member.summary: Gets the current serialization object graph.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.Component
member.summary: Gets the component holding the value. May be null.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.EventType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the event.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is handled. An handled object can be skipped, not written to the stream. If the object is written, First must be set to false, otherwise it must not be changed.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.First
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object being handled is first in the list. If the object is handled and written to the stream, this must be set to false after the stream is written. If the object is skipped, it must not be changed.
member.value: true if this is the first object; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value on the stack.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonEventArgs.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name on the stack. The Name can be a property or field name when serializing objects. May be null.

member.name: T:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute
member.summary: Provides options for JSON.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name to use for JSON serialization and deserialization.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name to use for JSON serialization and deserialization.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.IgnoreWhenSerializing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore this instance's owner when serializing.
member.value: true if this instance's owner must be ignored when serializing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.IgnoreWhenDeserializing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore this instance's owner when deserializing.
member.value: true if this instance's owner must be ignored when deserializing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonAttribute.HasDefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance has a default value. In this case, it's defined by the DefaultValue property.
member.value: true if this instance has default value; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions
member.summary: Define options for JSON serialization.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.None
member.summary: No option. Use Type Descriptor (including custom ones) when serializing custom objects.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.UseReflection
member.summary: Use pure reflection when serializing custom objects.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.UseXmlIgnore
member.summary: Avoid fields and properties marked with the XmlIgnore attribute.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.DateFormatCustom
member.summary: Use the format defined in the DateTimeFormat property of the JsonOptions class.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.SerializeFields
member.summary: Serializes fields.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.UseISerializable
member.summary: Use the ISerializable interface.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.DateFormatJs
member.summary: Use the [new Date(utc milliseconds)] format. Note this format is not generally supported by browsers native JSON parsers.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.DateFormatIso8601
member.summary: Use the ISO 8601 string format ('s' DateTime format).

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.UseScriptIgnore
member.summary: Avoid fields and properties marked with the ScriptIgnore attribute.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.DateFormatRoundtripUtc
member.summary: Use the ISO 8601 roundtrip string format ('o' DateTime format).

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.EnumAsText
member.summary: Serialize enum values as text.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.ContinueOnCycle
member.summary: Continue serialization if a cycle was detected.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.ContinueOnValueError
member.summary: Continue serialization if getting a value throws error.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.SkipNullPropertyValues
member.summary: Don't serialize properties with a null value.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.DateTimeOffsetFormatCustom
member.summary: Use the format defined in the DateTimeOffsetFormat property of the JsonOptions class.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.SkipNullDateTimeValues
member.summary: Don't serialize null date time values.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.AutoParseDateTime
member.summary: Automatically parse date time.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.WriteKeysWithoutQuotes
member.summary: Write dictionary keys without quotes.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.ByteArrayAsBase64
member.summary: Serializes byte arrays as base 64 strings.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.StreamsAsBase64
member.summary: Serializes streams as base 64 strings.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.SkipZeroValueTypes
member.summary: Don't serialize value type with a zero value.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.UseJsonAttribute
member.summary: Use the JSON attribute.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.SkipDefaultValues
member.summary: Don't serialize values equal to the default member (property, field) value, if defined.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.TimeSpanAsText
member.summary: Serialize TimeSpan values as text.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.SkipGetOnly
member.summary: Skip members with get only method.

member.name: F:ZeroDep.JsonSerializationOptions.Default
member.summary: The default value.

member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a JSON error occurs.

member.summary: The commn error prefix.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonException.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:ZeroDep.JsonException.GetCode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the errror code.
member.returns: The error code.

member.name: P:ZeroDep.JsonException.Code
member.summary: Gets the error code.
